tool_description: A simple api supports hotel  room booking
name: HotelAPI
title: HotelAPI

api_list.name: RoomBooking
api_list.description: This API will allow to book room for given count
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hotelapi5.p.rapidapi.com/room/book/2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hotelapi5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hotelapi5.p.rapidapi.com/room/book/{howmany}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hotelapi5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
